ComicInfo.Title: My Bum Was a Gateway To Another World!; Mark Part Four
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 10:43:25. [CVDB237818] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:18:40. [Issue ID 174884]
ComicInfo.Summary:
My Bum Was a Gateway To Another World!: The Professor, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan investigate Dimension X, a small portal located in a farmer's field.
Mark Part Four: Jesus exorcises the demons inside the man from Gerasa. A woman who has been hemorrhaging for twelve years touches Jesus's garment and is cured. He goes to Jairus's house, takes his dead daughter by the hand and revives her.
ComicInfo.Characters: Mister Ding,Allan,Farmer Smith,Unnamed Man from Dimension X,Professor,Nancy Reagan
